00001 /*
00002 
00003  * Credits: Julian Oliver, 2008-2009 <julian@julianoliver.com>.
00004  * 
00005  * This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it
00006  * under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free
00007  * Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option)
00008  * any later version.
00009  * 
00010  * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT
00011  * ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
00012  * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU General Public License for
00013  * more details.
00014  * 
00015  * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with
00016  * this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
00017  * 
00018  * This code is loosely based on the 'multigl' sample from Bazar. it has been
00019  * heavily modified to support texture and video-texture mapping to an OpenGL plane
00020  * over the ROI. The ROI in the model image is now read in from a file generated by
00021  * the training process, speeding up compositing and making it more accurate.
00022  * 
00023  * Usage:
00024  * 
00025  * 
00026  * There are four ways to use Artvertiser.
00027  * 
00028  * With video substitution the ROI: 
00029  *
00030  *       ./artvertiser -a /path/to/ROIvideo.avi 
00031  *
00032  * With video substitution of the ROI and capture from an AVI file
00033  *
00034  *  ./artvertiser -a /path/to/ROIvideo.avi -b /path/to/captureVideo
00035  *
00036  * With image substitution of the ROI and capture from a v4l device
00037  *
00038  *      ./artvertiser  
00039  *
00040 
00041 */

00151 /* use this to read paths from the file system
00152 
00153 std::string getExtension(const std::string &file)
00154 {
00155         string::size_type dot = file.rfind('.');
00156         string lcpath = file;
00157         string suffix;
00158         std::transform(lcpath.begin(), lcpath.end(), lcpath.begin(), tolower);
00159         if(dot != std::string::npos) 
00160         {
00161                 suffix = lcpath.substr(dot + 1);
00162         }
00163         return suffix;
00164 }
00165 */

00167 // text drawing function
00168 static void drawText(IplImage *img, const char *text, CvPoint point, CvFont *font, CvScalar colour, double size)
00169 {
00170         cvInitFont( font, CV_FONT_HERSHEY_DUPLEX, size, size, 0, 1, CV_AA);
00171         //cvInitFont( font, CV_FONT_HERSHEY_PLAIN, size, size, 0, 1, CV_AA);
00172         cvPutText(img, text, point, font, colour);
00173 }

00175 // read in ROI coords from txt file into vector.
00176 static std::vector<int>  readROI(const char *filename)
00177 {
00178         string l;
00179         ifstream roi(filename);
00180         std::vector<int> v;
00181         int coord;
00182         char s[10];
00183         char *s1;
00184         int lines = 0;
00185 
00186         if (roi.is_open())
00187         {
00188                 while (!roi.eof())
00189                 {
00190 
00191                         getline(roi, l);
00192                         strcpy(s, l.c_str());
00193                         s1 = strtok(s, " ");
00194         
00195                         while (s1 != NULL)
00196                         {
00197                                 //roi_vec.push_back(atoi(s1));
00198                                 v.push_back(atoi(s1));
00199                                 s1 = strtok(NULL, " ,");
00200                         }       
00201                 }
00202                 roi.close();
00203         }
00204         else 
00205         {
00206                 cout << "roi file not found" << endl;
00207         }
00208         return v;
00209 }

00216     int winHeight = HEIGHT;
00217     //int winWidth  = 800; 
00218     //int winHeight = 450;
00219     glViewport(0,0,winWidth, winHeight);
00220         glutPostRedisplay();
00221 }

00224 static void usage(const char *s) {
00225         cerr << "usage:\n" << s
00226                         << "[-m <model image>] [-r]\n"
00227                         "   -a  specify path to AVI (instead of v4l device)\n"
00228                         "       -b      specify path to AVI video artvert\n"
00229                         "       -m      specifies model image\n"
00230                         "       -r      do not load any data\n"
00231                         "       -t      train a new classifier\n"
00232                         "       -g      recompute geometric calibration\n"
00233                         "       -a  <path> load an AVI movie as an artvert\n"
00234                         "       -l      rebuild irradiance map from scratch\n";
00235         exit(1);
00236 }

00246 static bool init( int argc, char** argv )
00247 {
00248         // more from before init should be moved here
00249         bool redo_geom=false;
00250         bool redo_training=false;
00251         bool redo_lighting=false;
00252         char *avi_bg_path="";
00253         char *modelFile = "model.bmp";
00254 
00255         // parse command line
00256         for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00257                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-m") ==0) {
00258                         if (i==argc-1) usage(argv[0]);
00259                         modelFile = argv[i+1];
00260                         i++;
00261                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-r")==0) {
00262                         redo_geom=redo_training=redo_lighting=true;
00263                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-g")==0) {
00264                         redo_geom=redo_lighting=true;
00265                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-l")==0) {
00266                         redo_lighting=true;
00267                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-t")==0) {
00268                         redo_training=true;
00269                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-a")==0) {
00270                         avi_capture=cvCaptureFromAVI(argv[i+1]);
00271                         avi_play=true;
00272                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-b")==0) {
00273                         avi_bg_path=argv[i+1];
00274                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-i")==0) {
00275                         image_path=argv[i+1];
00276                 } else if (argv[i][0]=='-') {
00277                         usage(argv[0]);
00278                 } 
00279         }
00280 
00281         cout << avi_bg_path << endl;    
00282         cacheLight = !redo_lighting;
00283 
00284         multi = new MultiGrab(modelFile);
00285 
00286         if( multi->init(!redo_training, avi_bg_path) ==0)
00287         {
00288                 cerr <<"Initialization error.\n";
00289                 return false;
00290         }
00291 
00292         geom_calib_start(!redo_geom);
00293 
00294         artvert_struct artvert1 = {"Arrebato, 1980", image1, "Feb, 2009", "Iv√°n Zulueta", "Polo Commercial", "Madrid, Spain"};
00295         artvert_struct artvert2 = {"name2", image2, "2008", "simon innings", "Helmut Lang", "Parlance Avenue"};
00296         artvert_struct artvert3 = {"name3", image3, "2008", "simon innings", "Loreal", "Parlance Avenue"};
00297         artvert_struct artvert4 = {"name4", image4, "2008", "simon innings", "Hugo Boss", "Parlance Avenue"};
00298         artvert_struct artvert5 = {"name5", image5, "2008", "simon innings", "Burger King", "Parlance Avenue"};
00299 
00300         artverts[0] = artvert1;
00301         artverts[1] = artvert2;
00302         artverts[2] = artvert3;
00303         artverts[3] = artvert4;
00304         artverts[4] = artvert5;
00305 
00306         roiVec = readROI("model.bmp.roi");
00307         return true;
00308 }
00309 
00314 static void keyboard(unsigned char c, int x, int y)
00315 {
00316         switch (c) {
00317                 case 'n' : if (augment == 1)
00318                                                 augment = 0;
00319                                         else
00320                                                 augment = 1;
00321                 case '+' : if (current_cam < multi->cams.size()-1) 
00322                                    current_cam++;
00323                            break;
00324                 case '-': if (current_cam >= 1) 
00325                                   current_cam--;
00326                           break;
00327                 case 'q': exit(0); break;
00328                 case 'd': dynamicLight = !dynamicLight; break;
00329                 case 'a': if (avi_play == true)
00330                                         avi_play = false;
00331                                   else
00332                                         avi_play = true;
00333                 case 'f': glutFullScreen(); break;
00334                 case 'i': if (cnt >= 4)
00335                                         cnt = 0;
00336                                   else
00337                                         cnt ++;
00338                                   std::cout << "we are on image " << cnt << std::endl;
00339                                   break;
00340         }
00341         glutPostRedisplay();
00342 }

00344 static void emptyWindow() 
00345 {
00346         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00347 }
00348 
00349 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00350 {
00351         glutInit(&argc, argv);
00352         glutInitDisplayMode(GLUT_RGB | GLUT_DEPTH | GLUT_DOUBLE);
00353     glutInitWindowSize(WIDTH,HEIGHT); // hard set the init window size
00354     //glutInitWindowSize(800,450); // hard set the init window size
00355 
00356         glutDisplayFunc(emptyWindow);
00357     glutReshapeFunc(reshape);
00358         glutCreateWindow("artvertiser demo v-1.0");
00359 
00360     //ftglFont = new FTBufferFont("/usr/share/fonts/truetype/freefont/FreeMono.ttf");
00361     ftglFont = new FTBufferFont("fonts/FreeSans.ttf");
00362     ftglFont->FaceSize(12);
00363     ftglFont->CharMap(ft_encoding_unicode);
00364 
00365         if (!init(argc,argv)) return -1;
00366 
00367         cvDestroyAllWindows();
00368 
00369         glutKeyboardFunc(keyboard);
00370         glutMainLoop();
00371         return 0; /* ANSI C requires main to return int. */
00372 }
00373 
00375 static bool drawBackground(IplTexture *tex)
00376 {
00377         if (!tex || !tex->getIm()) return false;
00378 
00379         IplImage *im = tex->getIm();
00380         int w = im->width-1;
00381         int h = im->height-1;
00382 
00383         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00384         glLoadIdentity();
00385         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00386         glLoadIdentity();
00387 
00388         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00389         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00390 
00391         tex->loadTexture();
00392 
00393         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00394         glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00395 
00396         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(0), tex->v(0));
00397         glVertex2f(-1, 1);
00398 
00399         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(w), tex->v(0));
00400         glVertex2f(1, 1);
00401 
00402         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(w), tex->v(h));
00403         glVertex2f(1, -1);
00404 
00405         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(0), tex->v(h));
00406         glVertex2f(-1, -1);
00407         glEnd();
00408 
00409         tex->disableTexture();
00410 
00411         return true;
00412 }
00413 
00421 static void geom_calib_draw(void)
00422 {
00423         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00424 
00425         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00426         drawBackground(frameTexture);
00427 
00428         if (!multi) return;
00429 
00430         IplImage *im = multi->cams[current_cam]->frame;
00431         planar_object_recognizer &detector(multi->cams[current_cam]->detector);
00432         if (!im) return;
00433 
00434         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00435         glLoadIdentity();
00436         glOrtho(0, im->width-1, im->height-1, 0, -1, 1);
00437 
00438         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00439         glLoadIdentity();
00440 
00441         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00442         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00443         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00444 
00445         if (detector.object_is_detected) {
00446 
00447                 glPointSize(2);
00448                 glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00449                 glColor4f(0,1,0,1);
00450                 for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) {
00451 
00452                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00453                         if (match->inlier) {
00454                                 int s = (int)(match->image_point->scale);
00455                                 float x=PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, s, 0);
00456                                 float y=PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, s, 0);
00457                                 glVertex2f(x,y);
00458                         }
00459                 }
00460                 glEnd();
00461         }
00462 
00463         glutSwapBuffers();
00464 }
00465 
00469 static void geom_calib_end()
00470 {
00471 
00472         if (!multi->model.augm.LoadOptimalStructureFromFile("camera_c.txt", "camera_r_t.txt")) 
00473         {
00474                 cout << "failed to load camera calibration.\n";
00475                 exit(-1);
00476         }
00477         glutIdleFunc(0);
00478         //glutDisplayFunc(0);
00479         delete calib;
00480         calib=0;
00481 }
00482 
00488 static void geom_calib_idle(void)
00489 {
00490         // acquire images
00491         multi->grabFrames();
00492 
00493         // detect the calibration object in every image
00494         // (this loop could be paralelized)
00495         int nbdet=0;
00496         for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00497                 if (multi->cams[i]->detect()) nbdet++;
00498         }
00499 
00500         if(!frameTexture) frameTexture = new IplTexture;
00501         frameTexture->setImage(multi->cams[current_cam]->frame);
00502 
00503         if (nbdet>0) {
00504                 for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00505                         if (multi->cams[i]->detector.object_is_detected) {
00506                                 add_detected_homography(i, multi->cams[i]->detector, *calib);
00507                         } else {
00508                                 calib->AddHomography(i);
00509                         }
00510                 }
00511                 geom_calib_nb_homography++;
00512         }
00513 
00514         if (geom_calib_nb_homography>=150) {
00515                 if (calib->Calibrate(
00516                                         50, // max hom
00517                                         (multi->cams.size() > 1 ? 1:2),   // padding or random
00518                                         (multi->cams.size() > 1 ? 0:3),
00519                                         1,   // padding ratio 1/2
00520                                         0,
00521                                         0,
00522                                         0.0078125,      //alpha
00523                                         0.9,            //beta
00524                                         0.001953125,//gamma
00525                                         10,       // iter
00526                                         0.05, //eps
00527                                         3   //postfilter eps
00528                                    )) 
00529                 {
00530                         calib->PrintOptimizedResultsToFile1();
00531                         geom_calib_end();
00532                         photo_start();
00533                         return;
00534                 }
00535         }
00536 
00537         glutPostRedisplay();
00538 }
00539 
00543 static void geom_calib_start(bool cache)
00544 {
00545         if (cache && multi->model.augm.LoadOptimalStructureFromFile("camera_c.txt", "camera_r_t.txt")) {
00546                 photo_start();
00547                 return;
00548         }
00549 
00550         // construct a CamCalibration object and register all the cameras
00551         calib = new CamCalibration();
00552 
00553         for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00554                 calib->AddCamera(multi->cams[i]->width, multi->cams[i]->height);
00555         }
00556 
00557         geom_calib_nb_homography=0;
00558         glutDisplayFunc(geom_calib_draw);
00559         glutIdleFunc(geom_calib_idle);
00560 }
00561 
00562 //#define DEBUG_SHADER
00567 static void photo_draw(void)
00568 {
00569         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00570 
00571         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00572 
00573         // this is a better place for the frame drawing function (draw always) but we miss out on the
00574         // overlay drawing later. will find way to do both.
00575 
00576         drawBackground(frameTexture);
00577         //glLoadIdentity();
00578 
00579         string cnt_str;
00580         std::stringstream cnt_out;
00581         cnt_out << cnt;
00582         cnt_str = cnt_out.str();
00583 
00584         if (!multi) return;
00585 
00586         IplImage *im = multi->model.image;
00587         if (!im) return;
00588 
00589         // time running. perhaps useful for something?
00590     int now = glutGet(GLUT_ELAPSED_TIME);
00591         //cout << now/1000.0 << endl;
00592         time_t rawtime;
00593         struct tm *timeinfo;
00594         char tBuffer[80];
00595         time ( &rawtime );
00596         timeinfo = localtime ( &rawtime );
00597         strftime (tBuffer,80,"%I:%M:%S:%p, %d %b %Y",timeinfo);
00598         /*
00599         string timeStr;
00600         std::stringstream _timeStr;
00601         _timeStr << tBuffer;
00602         timeStr = _timeStr.str();
00603         */
00604 
00605         if (frameOK and augment == 1) {
00606 
00607                 foundMatch = 1;
00608                 // Fetch object -> image, world->image and world -> object matrices
00609                 CvMat *proj = multi->model.augm.GetProjectionMatrix(current_cam);
00610                 CvMat *world = multi->model.augm.GetObjectToWorld();
00611 
00612                 Mat3x4 moveObject, rot, obj2World, movedRT_;
00613                 moveObject.setTranslate(im->width/2,im->height/2,-120*3/4);
00614                 rot.setRotate(Vec3(1,0,0),2*M_PI*180.0/360.0);
00615                 moveObject.mul(rot);
00616                 CvMat cvMoveObject = cvMat(3,4,CV_64FC1, moveObject.m);
00617                 CvMat movedRT=cvMat(3,4,CV_64FC1,movedRT_.m);
00618 
00619                 double a_proj[3][4];
00620                 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00621                         for( int j = 0; j < 4; j++ ) {
00622                                 a_proj[i][j] = cvmGet( proj, i, j );
00623                                 obj2World.m[i][j] = cvmGet(world, i, j);
00624                 }
00625 
00626                 CamCalibration::Mat3x4Mul( world, &cvMoveObject, &movedRT);
00627                 // translate into OpenGL PROJECTION and MODELVIEW matrices
00628                 PerspectiveCamera c;
00629                 c.loadTdir(a_proj, multi->cams[0]->frame->width, multi->cams[0]->frame->height);
00630                 c.flip();
00631                 c.setPlanes(100,1000000); // near/far clip planes
00632                 cvReleaseMat(&proj);
00633 
00634                 tex = new IplTexture;
00635                 tex->setImage(frameTexture->getIm());
00636                 drawBackground(tex);
00637 
00638                 // must set the model view after drawing the background.
00639                 c.setGlProjection();            
00640                 c.setGlModelView();
00641 
00642 #ifndef DEBUG_SHADER
00643 
00644                 glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00645                 glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00646                 glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00647                 glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00648 
00649                 //glGenTextures(1, &imageID);
00650                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, imageID);
00651                 glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 1);
00652 
00653                 //glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00654                 //glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00655                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00656                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00657 
00658                 glTexEnvf(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_MODULATE); // multiply texture colour by surface colour of poly
00659                 glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST);      
00660                 
00661                 if (avi_play == true)
00662                 {
00663                         IplImage *avi_frame = 0;
00664                         IplImage *avi_image = 0;
00665                         avi_frame = cvQueryFrame( avi_capture );
00666                         avi_image = cvCreateImage(cvSize(512, 512), 8, 3); 
00667                         cvResize(avi_frame, avi_image, 0); // have to scale to power of two. will work out padding to avoid scale distortion later.
00668                         avi_image->origin = avi_frame->origin;
00669                         GLenum format = IsBGR(avi_image->channelSeq) ? GL_BGR_EXT : GL_RGBA;
00670                         glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, avi_image->width, avi_image->height, 0, format, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, avi_image->imageData);
00671                 }
00672                 else
00673                 {
00674                         IplImage image = *artverts[cnt].image;
00675                 GLenum format = IsBGR(image.channelSeq) ? GL_BGR_EXT : GL_RGBA;
00676                         glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, image.width, image.height, 0, format, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, image.imageData);
00677                 }
00678                         
00679                 glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00680 
00681                 glHint(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH, GL_NICEST);
00682                 glEnable(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH);
00683 
00684                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00685                         glTexCoord2f(0, 0);glVertex3f(roiVec[0], roiVec[1], 0);
00686                         glTexCoord2f(1, 0);glVertex3f(roiVec[2], roiVec[3], 0);
00687                         glTexCoord2f(1, 1);glVertex3f(roiVec[4], roiVec[5], 0);
00688                         glTexCoord2f(0, 1);glVertex3f(roiVec[6], roiVec[7], 0);
00689                 glEnd();
00690 
00691                 glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00692 
00693                 glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00694                         glColor3f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00695                         glVertex3f(roiVec[0]-10, roiVec[1]-10, 0);
00696                         glVertex3f(roiVec[2]+10, roiVec[3]-10, 0);
00697                         glVertex3f(roiVec[4]+10, roiVec[5]+10, 0);
00698                         glVertex3f(roiVec[6]-10, roiVec[7]+10, 0);
00699                         glVertex3f(roiVec[0]-10, roiVec[1]-10, 0);
00700                 glEnd();
00701 
00702                 glTranslatef(roiVec[2]+12, roiVec[3], 0);
00703                 glRotatef(180, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00704                 glRotatef(-45, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00705                 glColor4f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1);
00706 
00707                 glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00708                         glVertex3f(0, 10, -.2); 
00709                         glVertex3f(150, 10, -.2);       
00710                         glVertex3f(150, -60, -.2);      
00711                         glVertex3f(0, -60, -.2);        
00712                 glEnd();
00713 
00714                 glColor4f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0, .5);
00715 
00716                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00717                         glVertex3f(0, 10, -.2); 
00718                         glVertex3f(150, 10, -.2);       
00719                         glVertex3f(150, -60, -.2);      
00720                         glVertex3f(0, -60, -.2);        
00721                 glEnd();
00722                 
00723                 // render the text in the label
00724                 glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1);
00725                 ftglFont->Render(artverts[cnt].artvert);
00726                 glTranslatef(0, -12, 0);
00727                 ftglFont->Render(artverts[cnt].date);
00728                 glTranslatef(0, -12, 0);
00729                 ftglFont->Render(artverts[cnt].author);
00730                 glTranslatef(0, -12, 0);
00731                 ftglFont->Render(artverts[cnt].advert);
00732                 glTranslatef(0, -12, 0);
00733                 ftglFont->Render(artverts[cnt].street);
00734 
00735 #else
00736                 // we want to relight a color present on the model image
00737                 // with an irradiance coming from the irradiance map
00738                 /*
00739                 CvScalar color = cvGet2D(multi->model.image, multi->model.image->height/2, multi->model.image->width/2);
00740                 float normal[3] = { 
00741                         obj2World.m[0][2],
00742                         obj2World.m[1][2],
00743                         obj2World.m[2][2]};
00744 
00745                 CvScalar irradiance = multi->model.map.readMap(normal);
00746 
00747                 // the camera has some gain and bias
00748                 const float *g = multi->model.map.getGain(current_cam);
00749                 const float *b = multi->model.map.getBias(current_cam);
00750 
00751                 // relight the 3 RGB channels. The bias value expects 0 black 1 white,
00752                 // but the image are stored with a white value of 255: Conversion is required.
00753                 for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00754                         color.val[i] = (g[i]*(color.val[i]/255.0)*irradiance.val[i] + b[i]);
00755                 }
00756                 glColor3d(color.val[2], color.val[1], color.val[0]);
00757 
00758                 float half[2] = {
00759                         (multi->model.corners[0].x + multi->model.corners[1].x)/2,
00760                         (multi->model.corners[2].x + multi->model.corners[3].x)/2,
00761                 };
00762                 */
00763 #endif
00764                 //glEnd();
00765 
00766 #ifndef DEBUG_SHADER
00767                 // apply the object transformation matrix
00768                 Mat3x4 w2e(c.getWorldToEyeMat());
00769                 w2e.mul(moveObject);
00770                 c.setWorldToEyeMat(w2e);
00771                 c.setGlModelView();
00772 #endif
00773 
00774                 if (multi->model.map.isReady()) {
00775                         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00776 #ifdef DEBUG_SHADER
00777                         multi->model.map.enableShader(current_cam, world);
00778 #else
00779                         multi->model.map.enableShader(current_cam, &movedRT);
00780 #endif
00781                 } else {
00782                         GLfloat light_diffuse[]  = {1.0, 1, 1, 1.0};
00783                         GLfloat light_position[] = {500, 400.0, 500.0, 1};
00784                         Mat3x4 w2obj;
00785                         w2obj.setInverseByTranspose(obj2World);
00786                         w2obj.transform(light_position, light_position);
00787                         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE, light_diffuse);
00788                         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, light_position);
00789                         glEnable(GL_LIGHT0);
00790                         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00791                 }
00792 
00793                 cvReleaseMat(&world);
00794                 {
00795                         CvScalar c =cvGet2D(multi->model.image, multi->model.image->height/2, multi->model.image->width/2);
00796                         glColor3d(c.val[2], c.val[1], c.val[0]);
00797 /*
00798 #ifndef DEBUG_SHADER
00799                         glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00800 #else   
00801                         glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00802                         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00803                         glNormal3f(0,0,-1);
00804                         glVertex3f(half[0],multi->model.corners[0].y,0);
00805                         glVertex3f(multi->model.corners[1].x,multi->model.corners[1].y,0);
00806                         glVertex3f(multi->model.corners[2].x,multi->model.corners[2].y,0);
00807                         glVertex3f(half[1],multi->model.corners[3].y,0);
00808                         glEnd();
00809 #endif
00810 */
00811                 }
00812                 if (multi->model.map.isReady())
00813                         multi->model.map.disableShader();
00814                 else
00815                         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00816 
00817                 if ( avi_play == true  ) 
00818                 {
00819                         cvReleaseImage(&avi_image);
00820                         cvReleaseImage(&avi_frame);
00821                 }
00822         }
00823 
00824     glLoadIdentity();
00825         // we need to setup a new projection matrix for the title font.
00826         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00827         glLoadIdentity();
00828         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00829         glLoadIdentity();
00830 
00831         glTranslatef(-.98, 0.9, 0.0);
00832         glScalef(.003, .003, .003);
00833         ftglFont->FaceSize(32);
00834         glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1);
00835         ftglFont->Render("the artvertiser v0.2");
00836         ftglFont->FaceSize(16);
00837         glTranslatef(0, -(HEIGHT+30), 0);
00838         glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, .6);
00839         //ftglFont->Render(tBuffer);
00840         if (foundMatch == 1 and (now/1000)%2== 0)
00841         {
00842                 glTranslatef(WIDTH-295, HEIGHT+35, 0);
00843                 glColor4f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0, .8);
00844                 glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00845                         glVertex3f(140, 0, 0);  
00846                         glVertex3f(150, 10, 0); 
00847                         glVertex3f(140, 20, 0); 
00848                 glEnd();
00849                 glTranslatef(70, 5, 0);
00850                 ftglFont->FaceSize(16);
00851                 ftglFont->Render("tracking");
00852         }
00853 
00854         foundMatch=0;
00855         // reset the ftgl font size for next pass
00856         ftglFont->FaceSize(12);
00857 
00858         glutSwapBuffers();
00859         cvReleaseImage(&image); // cleanup used image
00860         glFlush();
00861 }
00862 
00869 static void photo_idle()
00870 {
00871         // acquire images
00872         multi->grabFrames();
00873 
00874         // detect the calibration object in every image
00875         // (this loop could be paralelized)
00876         int nbdet=0;
00877         for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00878                 if (multi->cams[i]->detect()) nbdet++;
00879         }
00880 
00881         if(!frameTexture) frameTexture = new IplTexture;
00882         frameTexture->setImage(multi->cams[current_cam]->frame);
00883 
00884 
00885         frameOK=false;
00886         if (nbdet>0) {
00887                 multi->model.augm.Clear();
00888                 for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00889                         if (multi->cams[i]->detector.object_is_detected) {
00890                                 add_detected_homography(i, multi->cams[i]->detector, multi->model.augm);
00891                         } else {
00892                                 multi->model.augm.AddHomography();
00893                         }
00894                 }
00895                 frameOK = multi->model.augm.Accomodate(4, 1e-4);
00896         }
00897 
00898         if (frameOK) {
00899                 // fetch surface normal in world coordinates
00900                 CvMat *mat = multi->model.augm.GetObjectToWorld();
00901                 float normal[3];
00902                 for (int j=0;j<3;j++) normal[j] = cvGet2D(mat, j, 2).val[0];
00903                 cvReleaseMat(&mat);
00904 
00905                 // During photometric calibration phase or 
00906                 // for light update...
00907                 if (!multi->model.map.isReady() || dynamicLight) {
00908                         for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size();++i) {
00909                                 // ..collect lighting measures
00910                                 if (multi->cams[i]->detector.object_is_detected) {
00911                                         nbLightMeasures++;
00912                                         multi->model.map.addNormal(normal, *multi->cams[i]->lc, i);
00913                                 }
00914                         }
00915                 }
00916 
00917                 // when required, compute all the lighting parameters
00918                 if (!multi->model.map.isReady() && multi->model.map.nbNormals() > 80) {
00919                         if (multi->model.map.computeLightParams()) {
00920                                 multi->model.map.save();
00921                         }
00922                 }
00923         }
00924         glutPostRedisplay();
00925 }
00926 
00928 static void photo_start()
00929 {
00930         // allocate light collectors
00931         multi->allocLightCollector();
00932 
00933         if (cacheLight) multi->model.map.load();
00934 
00935         nbLightMeasures=0;
00936         glutIdleFunc(photo_idle);
00937         glutDisplayFunc(photo_draw);
00938 }
